1$Condition: Attention Deficit Disorder with Hyperactivity$8/15/2012 9:00:20 AM$Reviewer: skysouldier
column2: 25-34 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $5$1$1$I was on ritalin xr 20mg three times a day and it would still wear off. I slept fine but it took three months for me to realize it had made me so efficient that everyone else was just in my way... I started getting very aggravated and had severe headaches when it wore off. It definitely helped me focus and deal with the scattered thoughts of add/adhd but the side effects became not worth it. When my friends started asking why I was so cranky all the time I started to worry and took myself off it. I had a very add week but no headaches or irritability issues. I am now on vyvanse and so far it seems to be treating my symptoms with no major side effects. It calms me down
column4: also I do not have headaches when it wears off. The only thing is
column6: it seems very bad for small children. Also
column7: the first day I took it I forgot to eat. So I now eat three meals a day
column8: hungry or not. I hope this helps with your add experience if you are un-medicated I am sure you stopped reading after the first three words...
